privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.hero_desc: We value your personal information for your confidence and safety in usage.
privacy.section1_p1: The company places great importance on protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit or use our website services, in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (PDPA).
privacy.section2_p1: We may collect various types of personal information as follows:
privacy.section3_l1: Contacting back and presenting property information you are interested in (e.g., scheduling property tours).
privacy.section3_l2: Improving and developing the website usage experience to be better.
privacy.section3_l3: Analyzing statistical information for marketing purposes (in an aggregated, non-identifiable format).
privacy.section3_l4: Complying with laws and regulations related to the real estate business.
privacy.section4_p1: Our website uses cookies to help make your website usage more efficient. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can choose to 'Accept' or 'Reject' cookies through the cookie settings bar or your browser settings.
privacy.section5_p1: Under PDPA law, you have the right to manage your personal information as follows:
privacy.right1: The right to access and request a copy of personal information
privacy.right2: The right to request correction of information to be accurate and current
privacy.right3: The right to request deletion, destruction, or suspension of the use of information
privacy.right4: The right to withdraw consent you have previously given
privacy.section6_p1: If you have questions or wish to exercise your rights regarding personal information, you can contact our Personal Data Protection Officer at:
privacy.customer_service_desc: We are ready to take care of and answer your questions.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.hero_desc: Please read these terms carefully before using the website.
terms.welcome_p1: By using this website, you are considered to have accepted all terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms.section1_p1: These conditions apply to everyone who uses the service, whether general visitors, members, or customers. If you do not accept any of the conditions, please suspend website usage.
terms.section2_p1: Content, images, videos, logos, and all information appearing on this website are considered the intellectual property of the company or the licensed right owners.
terms.cant1: Prohibited from copying images for commercial use
terms.cant2: Prohibited from modifying articles or content
terms.cant3: Prohibited from falsely claiming ownership rights
terms.can1: Share website links to Social Media
terms.can2: Reference information by giving clear credit
terms.section3_alert_p1: Prices and property details may be changed by property owners, or they may ƒë√£ be sold/rented already, without us being able to update information on the website immediately.
terms.section3_alert_p2: *Users should check information with our staff again before deciding.
terms.section4_p1: This agreement is under the enforcement of the laws of the Kingdom of Thailand. Any dispute resolution shall proceed according to Thai legal processes.
terms.help_desc: If you wish to inquire about details concerning terms of usage
